channel.title: How to make an npc say: "Owner Is Online ! Or Offline !"?
channel.description:
I would like to know that because people are asking: Does the Owner is Online ? And they could know it. I would like to know a code and where to place it. I'm use DeltaScape's base.
Thanks.
